name: projekt-ai-portfolio-system
description: Comprehensive portfolio management system for Projekt AI website

scripts.build:dev: npm run clean:dist && npm run portfolio:generate && npm run quality:check && npm run copy:dist
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run portfolio:generate && npm run quality:validate-all && npm run seo:generate-sitemap && npm run copy:dist
scripts.build:preview: npm run clean:dist && npm run portfolio:generate && npm run quality:check && npm run copy:dist
scripts.build:branch: npm run clean:dist && npm run portfolio:generate && npm run quality:check && npm run copy:dist
scripts.copy:dist: cp -r *.html dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp -r admin-dashboard dist/ && cp -r sitemap.xml dist/ && echo '✅ Files copied to dist directory'
scripts.staging:build-all: npm run portfolio:generate && echo '✅ All staging versions built'
scripts.deploy:full: npm run portfolio:generate && git add . && git commit -m 'Full portfolio deployment' && git push
scripts.deploy:backup: cp -r . ../backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) && echo '💾 Backup created before deployment'
scripts.deploy:safe: npm run deploy:backup && npm run deploy:full
scripts.quality:check: echo '🔍 Running quality checks...' && npm run project:review
scripts.quality:validate-all: node -e "const mgr = require('./scripts/project-lifecycle.js'); const manager = new mgr(); manager.config.portfolio_projects.forEach(p => manager.reviewProject(p.id));"
scripts.seo:check: echo '🔍 SEO validation...' && node -e "const config = require('./portfolio-config.json'); config.portfolio_projects.forEach(p => console.log(p.title + ': ' + p.description.length + ' chars'));"
scripts.seo:generate-sitemap: node -e "const config = require('./portfolio-config.json'); const urls = config.portfolio_projects.filter(p => p.status === 'live').map(p => config.portfolio_system.base_url + p.portfolio_url); console.log('<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n<urlset xmlns=\"http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9\">'); urls.forEach(url => console.log('  <url><loc>' + url + '</loc></url>')); console.log('</urlset>');" > sitemap.xml
scripts.maintenance:clean: rm -rf staging/* && rm -rf temp/* && echo '🧹 Cleaned temporary files'
scripts.maintenance:validate-config: node -e "try { JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('portfolio-config.json', 'utf8')); console.log('✅ Configuration valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('❌ Configuration invalid:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.analytics:generate-report: node -e "const config = require('./portfolio-config.json'); const live = config.portfolio_projects.filter(p => p.status === 'live'); console.log('📊 Portfolio Analytics:\n'); console.log('Live Projects:', live.length); console.log('Total Projects:', config.portfolio_projects.length); console.log('Categories:', [...new Set(config.portfolio_projects.map(p => p.category))].join(', '));"
scripts.help:
echo '
🎯 PROJEKT AI PORTFOLIO SYSTEM

📋 Portfolio Management:
  npm run portfolio:generate    # Generate all portfolio pages
  npm run portfolio:deploy      # Deploy to production
  npm run portfolio:update-main # Update main page only

🔧 Project Lifecycle:
  npm run project:list          # List all projects
  npm run project:develop <id>  # Enter development mode
  npm run project:build <id>    # Build staging version
  npm run project:review <id>   # Quality review
  npm run project:deploy <id>   # Deploy specific project

🚀 Quick Commands:
  npm start                     # Start local server
  npm run deploy:safe           # Safe deployment with backup
  npm run quality:validate-all  # Check all projects
  npm run help                  # Show this help
'

author: Timothy Poulton - Projekt AI
